#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	int n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int arr[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>arr[i];
		sort(arr,arr+n);
		int temp[n];
		int l=0,r=n-1;
		int j=0;
		while(l<=r)
		{
			temp[j++]=arr[r];
			temp[j++]=arr[l];
			l++;
			r--;
		}
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		cout<<temp[i]<<" ";
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
